## Methods

### Data Sources

Data found in SIS. 

### Data Analysis

Each stock has a threshold and catch value assigned to it from the sources above. The table below outlines the data pull for each Fisheries Management Plan (FMP). 

|  FMP              | Quota Type  |  Fishing Year    |  
|-------------------|-------------|------------------|
| Atlantic Herring  |  ABC        | January 1 through December 31
| Atlantic Sea Scallop | | Apr 1 - Mar 31
| Red Crab | |  Apr 1 - Mar 31
| Skates | | May 1 through April 30
| Groundfish | | May 1 through April 30
| Monkfish  | | May 1 through April 30
| Golden Tilefish | | November 1 through October 31
